comments.commentBody: Lock him up!
Trump will sink to any level to cover up his actions. A complete investigation is absolutely necessary, since this speaks of high treason on part of a totally unscrupulous president. Shame on him!

replies.commentBody: The fact that Sessions met at least twice with the Russian ambassador is not in fact consistent with either his written or spoken testimony.

comments.commentBody:
Jeff Sessions met with the Russian ambassador in an official capacity as a member of the Senate Armed Services Committee, which is entirely consistent with his testimony. It's no surprise Senator Al Franken is pushing this story immediately following President Trump's successful address to the nation.

So....This is just ANOTHER FAKE NEWS attack against the Trump Administration by partisan Democrats and thier lapdog media. The entire episode is a cover to distract from the DNC wikileaks... That provided MASSIVE evidence of fraud to stop Sanders and the Reps and overwhelming collusion with the fake MSM! DNC Chair Debbie Wasserman Schultz was forced to resign!!!! Where is the investigation about this???? I also have a copy of John Pedasta's email to all the MSM on how to rig a political poll via over-sampling. He even attached a 37 PDF with the sordid details... Where are the investigations about all this too?

The CLinton Foundation ALSO ironically helped Russia gain control of 20% of US uranium.... The hypocrisy is astonishing... GOOGLE!!!! "Uranium One and the Clinton Foundation" ...Uranium One is the Canadian Corp that they helped to sell to the Russians..

We already knew the US Republic had been seized.

Now we get to find out if it's been strangled.

Do your jobs, despicable denizens of America's disgraceful Congress.

NY Times: Thank you for staying on target after Trump's and the Republicans attempt last night to "overspeak" (i.e. divert) Americans' attention away from Trump and his campaign's collusion with Russian intelligentsia.

Please continue to uncover the evidence for the sake of our Democracy!

This narrative reveals that Sean Spicer is also a pathological liar.
What a great Administration. Thank you Evangelicals.

So....trump, Sessions, Flynn, Bannon, Manafort.....and God knows how many others can't sweep this under the rug.

What a shame

#trump SAD.

Mr. Spicer, you say there is "no there, there." Well, get used to it. Indeed, after decades of nothing there, there with the Clintons, this is just the start for you and your colleagues where we already have proof of nefariousness.

This is clearly the most untrustworthy, reckless, inexperienced (public servants), vindictive and cruel administration ever to control the White House. And all of it there is there on the surface for all to see.

By the way, Mr. Spicer, what does the commander in chief intend to do about Russian airstrikes against American allies in Syria? Is he trying to support his buddy Putin by dismissing it without a word? Republicans are, not surprisingly, providing their silent blessing to Putin and POTUS too.

Session's evasion from answering Mr. Franken's straight forward question says a lot, as does the continuing Republican support for this administration.

The infestation obviously goes all the way to the top - and it is plain to see by our close European allies too. Therefore, POTUS should recuse himself from his office and from damaging this country any further.

The leaks POTUS is so worried about are not revealing national security secrets - they are revealing national security threats from within our own new government.

Trump's collusion with RUSSIA must be and should be investigated by bipartisan independent judicial council. It is reported that senator Jeff Session was involved in the Russian connection ring. If it is true, he should resign and looke upon wether he lied under oath in his nomination hearing. This conspiracy against America smells obnoxious . Thorough and transparent investigation has to be done immediately. Treasonous act is suspected. Republican leaders must put the interest of the country above the interest of their party.

'The White House has dismissed the story as false.' The problem for this White House is that they so consistenly lie about everything that even if the story was false, why would anyone give any of their denials [about anything] any credibility?
Lock him up!   Lock him up!   Lock him up!   Long him up !   Lock him up!!!!!

It'll be interesting to see if the intelligence agencies of our allies are remaining quiet about this "for now" hoping it'll play-out correctly within the US without their getting involved.  Countries don't want to be seen as potentially interfering in the politics of allied countries.  If the intelligence agencies of our allies know more and they see the GOP is engaged in a cover-up, we'll probably start seeing key information being leaked out in ways that won't trace back to those nations.
Now the President is saying that we're going to have a one-party system in the US. How far do we let this go ?

replies.commentBody: Regarding your questions I'll channel KellyAnne Conway: Do you have any evidence that those things did not happen?

They knew by Russians leaking stolen data timed perfectly to cause the most damage, she had a poor shot of it. But thankfully, they are letting the agencies scrutinize their new land lord. This is way too connected for US to allow to become political. The did not go nuclear like Trump and claim HE is the mole.

Understand this, the Five Eyes see and hear everything. What they got is Russians talking to Russians about what they got off the GOP at their convention.

comments.commentBody:
Hacking? Did Russians cast popular votes? Did they cast votes in the electoral college? Did they bus in illegal Russian immigrants from Vladivostok to vote in Simi Valley?

Nope, they merely revealed that Hillary Clinton couldn't keep sensitive information secret. She had her maid print up classified material, among other really dumb things.

The only thing revealed by this is that even Obama suspected she was going to lose. SAD!

replies.commentBody: You call that reporting?  Did you read the actual transcript or watch the full  video?  You've been manipulated by fake news

comments.commentBody: Thanks NYT for your reporting.  Some day it would be interesting to learn whether Trump and others in his administration understand the importance of telling the truth--or for that matter whether they care about the difference between truth and falsehoods.

Just for starters, AG Sessions, Press Secretary Spicer, and everyone else in the administration should be questioned by the FBI. I they are found in lies, they should be prosecuted for that in addition to charges to follow. Then Congress should act to name a Special Prosecutor. Following that investigation and findings of a grand conspiracy with Russia to rig the election, they should declare a Constitutional crisis, followed by a do-over of the election. Trump can then operate his businesses from a prison cell instead of the Oval Office.
To use a phrase heard chanted frequently in a recent election...  "LOCK HIM UP!"

.
Prior to the election, didn’t Trump say he had no relationship with Putin?
Interesting, but Trump tweeted an invitation to Putin in 2013 to attend the Miss Universe pageant. Putin declined, but sent him a small gift.

“Inside Trump’s financial ties to Russia and his unusual flattery of Vladimir Putin”
By Tom Hamburger, Rosalind S. Helderman and Michael Birnbaum
June 17, 2016
https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/inside-trumps-financial-ties-to-...
“Donald Trump was in his element, mingling with beauty pageant contestants and business tycoons as he brought his Miss Universe pageant to Russia for a much-anticipated Moscow debut. Nonetheless, Trump was especially eager for the presence of another honored guest: Russian President Vladimir Putin.

Trump tweeted Putin a personal invitation to attend the pageant, and a one-on-one meeting between the New York businessman and the Russian leader was scheduled for the day before the show.

Putin canceled at the last minute, but he sent a decorative lacquered box, a traditional Russian gift, and a warm note, according to Aras Agalarov, a Moscow billionaire who served as a liaison between Trump and the Russian leader.”

So the same Democrats that were completely unconcerned about Hillary deleting tens of thousands of emails off a private server are now concerned someone might delete an email from a backed up gov computer? those Democrats?
Where were these "patriotic" Democrats when they and their leadership put up every conceivable roadblock to the investigations of Hillary Clinton, Benghazi, the Clinton Foundation and Fast and Furious? This is pure partisanship bordering on madness with the wild and undocumented allegations of the Russians under every rock. McCarthy would be proud!

comments.commentBody: The greatest president in my lifetime, President Obama, deserves an incredible thanks from all PATRIOTIC AMERICANS for making sure that Don the Con's treason would be found out!  As for you Trump supporters, I hear the Russian winter is a lovely time to move to PutinLand!

Is anybody upset that our counterintelligence agencies didn't detect and stop the Russian cyber stacks more quickly?  Are they protecting us now?  I wish Obama administration officials had done a better job in overseeing these agencies.

replies.commentBody: OMG. Peoples love for a reality tv star extends so far beyond normal reality that all you can do is shake your head in amazement.  Comparing a public statement from Reagan to hacking our voting machines/candidates emails is so far beyond absurd I can't believe I'm even responding.

comments.commentBody: Show me please how Russia hacked the 2016 election.  Were dead people voting?  Were ballots stolen?  Were elderly people denied access to the polls? Phantom voters?  (And please, do not forget about ACORN who blatantly stuffed ballot boxes on behalf of  Obama.)  I am SO SICK of the NY Times bias against Trump.  Get over it -- he won, When Ronald Reagan said "Tear down this wall .." was that not influencing another country's government?  I want FACT and DETAILS.
What does it take to begin the Impeachment process?  How much more?  Another Trump official has lied.  Trump's veracity--who believes in it?
Sean Spicer is the new Baghdad Bob...
